about_the_game:
Horizon Walker is a turn-based RPG with a unique storyline and captivating graphics. ​

Join forces with stunning characters from beyond the dimensions and fight against the gods.​

Story Overview

Mankind’s thriving civilization was brought to a halt by the sudden appearance of dimensional “Rifts.”​

From these Rifts, divine beings emerged, ruthlessly destroying and pillaging civilizations. Mankind called them the "Forsaken Gods."​

Despite resistance, mankind could not find a way to counter the barriers created by these "Forsaken Gods" and the Oblivia phenomenon, which turned humans into abominations.​

Fear and despair engulfed the world, and hope vanished.​

As mankind hopelessly awaited its destruction, a miraculous rumor spread—someone had killed an Abandoned God and stolen their power.​

People honored him as the Human God and offered their devotion.​

​This is the tale of a remarkable Human God born in the East Asian Federation.​

Key Features

▶ Unique and Distinctive Characters​

Join forces with stunning characters from beyond the dimensions and fight against the Forsaken Gods.​

​

▶ Tactical Real-Time Strategy System​

Dominate time and space as both the commander of the battlefield and a Human God to save humanity!​

​

▶ Rich and Deep Romance Events​

Experience complex romantic events as you grow and interact with various characters!​

​

▶ Secret Content that Reflects Inner Desires​

Discover the secret chambers that reveal the deepest affections of the characters!​

​

▶ Gripping and Unique Worldview and Storyline​

Experience a grotesque and dark world where you, as a Human God, save humanity from its fate.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit or above
  • Processor: Intel Core2 duo E8300 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit or above
  • Processor: Intel I5 760 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
